protein.specific_function: May participate in the regulation of visual phototransduction or in the integration of photoreceptor metabolism

reference.reference_text: Abe T, Nakabayashi H, Tamada H, Takagi T, Sakuragi S, Yamaki K, Shinohara T: Analysis of the human, bovine and rat 33-kDa proteins and cDNA in retina and pineal gland. Gene. 1990 Jul 16;91(2):209-15.
Watanabe Y, Kawasaki K, Miki N, Kuo CH: Isolation and analysis of the human MEKA gene encoding a retina-specific protein. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1990 Jul 31;170(2):951-6.
